Welcome to Lumion, one of the best 3D rendering for CAD projects for Windows! With this tool you can import your model and transform it into a realistic project adding shadow, landscape and much more with a few clicks. Discover how to use Lumion 12 and Lumion 12.5 in just 15 minutes with this super-short tutorial for beginners.
